name: MyTrash
0:
”Alexa, open My Trash.”
”Alexa, ask My Trash for Today”
”Alexa, ask My Trash when is Burnable”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my trash
des:
You can know trash that you can throw away on a day, based on the trash schedule which you registered.

■ Check trash by date
Please specify such as "Today", "Tomorrow", "The day after tomorrow" and the day of the week, then you can know trash which be able to thrown on the desired day.

"what's trash today?"
"Alexa, ask My Trash what's tommorow."
"Alexa, ask My Trash for Wednesday."

■ Check date by kind of trash
You can specify the type of trash that has been registered, and know the date when you can throw away most recently.

"When is Burnable?"
"When is Plastic?"
"Alexa ask,My Trash when is Other trash."

*Please say such as "when is other trash?" if you want to know what you registered as "other". The name you entered arbitrarily can not be used.

■ Confirm schedule
You can confirm trash schedule you registerd.

"Confirm schedule"
"Alexa, ask My Trash to tell me schedule."

■ Account link is required
It is necessary to register a trash plan to use the skills. Set up an account link and register a trash removal schedule from the web page.

■contact
